title: Legacy Take Down The Chiefs

replies.body:
It was such an exciting game - we will have to see if the added exposure to playing live games will help Legacy continue to perform like that throughout the finals gauntlet! 

Chiefs also have a habit of firing up and playing even harder when they are behind, so it's going to be hell exciting!

i dont watch opl at all but decided to watch those 2 games, both phenomenal teams. 

Tally outshined Swipper and Legacy botlane looked absolutely amazing even against the Chiefs bot. Claire's laning phase is solid, he is able to go toe to toe with Swiffer.
 
It was really fun to watch the 2 best teams perform, you could tell they are a cut above the rest, it's gonna be exciting when they vs each other again. 

Props to legacy, they made me a fan in those games but dont discount chiefs either im sure they will work harder and improve for future battles.
